about_the_game:
Welcome to the next part of spicy adventures!
On your way you’ll meet some old pals as well as brand new faces. Wonder what awaits Bella and Elliott’s relationship? Would you like to know how it is to have two hot girlies as roommates? Or, have you ever dreamed of authoritative nurse caring for you in a hospital?
Prepare to dive in all those stories… and check animations and dialogues spiced with professional voiceovers!



Don’t forget to add the game to your wishlist and click the follow button so you won’t miss out on exciting news and exclusive previews!




A lavish woman deserves lavish ambitions: Bella is now a runner-up in city mayor elections. The race promises to be tough, but this elegant lady has two… private secretaries at her side. Eliott is always eager to provide any services she might request, anytime, anywhere! Only he’s unsure which place in this election campaign is reserved for Judy.


What's better than renting an apartment alone? Renting an apartment with friends, and paying less! And even better is when the drudgery of life and the search for real estate brings you into one apartment with two... interesting women. Sarah and Christine are complete opposites, but both of them crave the attentions of their new housemate, who’s ready to listen to them and serve them… a delicious dinner.


Every garage rock band is destined for fame!.. Unless they break up before that, thanks to some asshole Curt who is staring at the guitar girlboss all the time and sighing languidly instead of singing properly! The fate of the band depends on whether Ashley will finally shoot him down or jump into his embrace after his tender cerenade. Everybody is saved if he gets just one teeny-tiny kiss from this princess of rock!.. Let’s hope cleaning up the garage doesn’t shatter all the romance in the air into tiny pieces.


Fred’s fallen victim to his adrenaline-high passions, and for the time being the world of street racing is off limits for him. Simply speaking, Fred is staying in the hospital bed, wrapped in bandages head-to-toe like an ancient mummy, and his broken bones complain at every movement. Luckily, he can rest assured that the new nurse will do anything to cater to his needs… and she’s determined to lift his spirits at any cost.


Margo is deathly tired, her work in “Dominatrixxx-Hotline” has worn her down. Only a fellow veteran of industry, a professional Master and an overall cutie named Lionel can understand her worries of burning out. Seems like it’s the perfect time to try a new lingerie set and pay him a visit, to let Lionel handle her and… uh, share experience, hehe! Ahem, there’s nothing more refreshing than a heated discussion between two professionals.

Features:
• Five new hot VOICE ACTED scenarios
• More than 60 fully original artworks
• Longer animated sex scenes with sound and voiceovers
• Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards
• Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features

content_descriptors.notes: The game features nude male and female furry characters, explicit graphic sex scenes between them, threesome sex, sex with sex toys, BDSM, dubious consent sex, public sex and scenes featuring alcohol and intoxication.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core

short_description: Sex and the Furry Titty 3 is turning the heat up to the max! More sex, more tittes and more wild furry ladies! Five new VOICE ACTED scenarios will plunge you even deeper into the throbbing warmth full of seductice choices. Conquer the match-3 challenges, enjoy the most tempting animated scenes yet.
